title: WTB: The following T206's in Fr-Gd/Vg list 2
author: t206wagner

posts.post_title: WTB: The following T206's in Fr-Gd/Vg list 2
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following cards in fair to good/very good condition. Please email me at [url]t206wagner@yahoo.com[/url] if you have any for sale. Thanks.

Nap Lajoie with bat
Perry Lipe
Carl Lundgren Chicago
Carl Lundgren Kansas City

Rube Marquard pitching follow through

John McGraw portrait with cap

Dave, 

I have some of those available depending on if you want that particular grade:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=117623[/url]

Let me know - Rob
